column17:
Playboy Play It Spicy Eau de Toilette - 75 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.1700

Key Features

  • Most Unusual - Oriental Floral and Hot
  • Features Main Accords of Fruity Vanilla and Woody Notes
Full of exciting possibilities the world unfolds in front of the Playboy woman who stands before it unafraid sensual and alluring with naughtiness in her heart. Play It Spicy is a fragrance that adds an enticingly spicy edge to your feminine aura. Tempting and irresistible the heady aroma of Play It Spicy dazzles you with reminiscences of a glitzy boudoir where an impishly beautiful woman sits before the gilt-edged mirror revelling in the glory of her conquests.

The fragrance opens with the opulence of fruity floral notes - a top note of pomegranate bellini cocktail and luscious pink berries trail into an intoxicating heart note of tiger lily passion flower and heliotrope. The ambrosial base of sandal wood and vanilla essence adds spicy warmth to this elixir. Play It Spicy certainly is an invigorating signature scent that refuses to be ignored. Encased in a dark sparkling vial with ambrosial hints this perfume is for the exotic temptress in you.
